statements: UPDATE player_progress SET progress_percent = 75.50, movement_history = '{"moves": ["up", "left", "right"]}' WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_level = 10;
UPDATE player_progress SET movement_history = '{"moves": ["down", "right", "up"]}', progress_percent = 50.25 WHERE player_id = 456 AND game_level = 15;
UPDATE player_progress SET progress_percent = 75.50 WHERE player_id = 101 AND game_level = 10;
UPDATE player_progress SET progress_percent = 50.25, movement_history = '{"steps": 100, "time_spent": 3600}' WHERE game_level = 15 AND player_id = 201;
UPDATE PlayerProgress SET level = 10, progress_percentage = 75.5 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE MovementHistory SET movement_type = 'Jump', movement_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE movement_id = 100;
UPDATE PlayerProgress SET level = 5, progress_percentage = 80.5 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE MovementHistory SET movement_type = 'jumping', movement_timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_progress SET experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE movement_history SET x_position = 10.5, y_position = 15.3 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE player_progress SET level = 10, experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE movement_history SET x_position = 10.5, y_position = 20.3, timestamp = '2022-10-15 15:30:00' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_progress SET level_completed = 10 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE movement_history SET movement_type = 'Jump' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_progress SET points_scored = 1500 WHERE player_id = 1234;

UPDATE level_data SET level_name = 'Advanced Level' WHERE difficulty_level = 3;
